H0.text: What is the smallest Canadian province. Nova Scotia

H1.text: What is the smallest Canadian province. New Brunswick

H2.text: What is the smallest Canadian province. Newfoundland and Labrador

H3.text: What is the smallest Canadian province. PEI

A4.text: Prince Edward Island is the smallest province by both land area and population.

A5.text: Prince Edward Island has a land area of 5,686.03 km2.
